transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Good morning sir, Ratna baat kar rahi IndiaMART se, Manoj ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan bol rahe hain madam.
Executive: Woh Manoj sir kal na shaam ke time pe aapka ek concern open hua tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ticket concern open hua tha.
Executive: Woh Angit sir hai na unka number se open nahi ho raha tha woh keh rahe the.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Toh waise maine unse connect kiya tha raat mein hi shaam ke time pe 8:00-9:00 baje ke aas paas kyunki woh thoda pareshan ho rahe the WhatsApp pe unhone sab kuch share kiya.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Maine connect kiya aur baad mein login ho bhi gaya tha.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan toh meri ya toh aap baat kara de sir unse agar hai aas paas koi toh.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Just a minute.

The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aapni je byaktir songe kotha bolchen, tini apnar call-ti hold-e rekhechen. Doya kore line-e thakun. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line ko bane rahe.

The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Call kar lenge ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Aabhi unka engage aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Number toh unko bolte hain call kar lenge.
Executive: Achha toh yeh sir concern aapne hi open kiya tha kal raat mein?
Customer: Actually matlab woh pareshan the actually main hamare BDM wohi hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Toh woh kuch login mein unka ek dusra profile bhi tha IndiaMART ka shayad usi ka number ka kuch her fer ho gaya tha.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Haan woh woh wale mein jaake dusra number daal rahe the ki kya ho raha tha toh seller profile haan do ek seller profile bhi hai ek buyer profile bhi hai toh uske liye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kuch maine phir raat mein login ho gaya tha subah meri baat hui unse toh woh bole ki maine sort out ho gaya tha.
Executive: Achha toh actually unhone kya kiya tha sir ki ek ticket open kiya tha IndiaMART pe hamare customer care pe ticket hota hai na toh unhone tab tak ticket open kar diya main connect kar rahi thi unse waise aisa nahi hai kyunki unhone jaise hi call kiya maine response kiya 9:00 baje tak hi meri unse discussion hui hai sab cheezon pe just solution mil gaya hai then lekin abhi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap unko bole bhi the ki abhi raat ho gaya subah isko hum log sort out kar lenge toh raat mein aapko disturb kiya ek minute unka phone aa raha hai.
Executive: Are nahi nahi sir koi issue nahi hai haan rukiye unka phone aa raha hai.

The person
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan madam.
Executive: Good morning.
Executive: Angit sir baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello sir good morning woh sir kal raat mein jo aapka problem tha na woh us pe aapne concern open kiya tha na IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Haan nahi main toh kuch officially matlab kuch post post nahi kiya tha ticket raise nahi kiya tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir ek concern open ho gaya tha kal raat mein ticket pe haan and aapne.
Customer: Kya baat hai?
Executive: Ek ticket ka sir aapne open kiya tha comment kiya tha kahin pe uske through.
Customer: Nahi concern main koi concern nahi kiya tha main aapse baat kar raha tha jo concern tha aapse baat mein matlab phone mein baat kar raha tha.
Executive: Haan haan actually 9696 aap call center pe aapne call kar diya tha toh usse ticket open ho jaati hai.
Customer: Oh achha right right right.
Executive: Ji ji jaise aapko bhi problem hai toh aap ispe call kar sakte hain taaki ticket lekin woh aata account manager ke paas hai aur usko account manager hi solution provide karta hai toh main assist kar rahi thi but shayad aapko wahan bhi call gaya tha.
Customer: Right.
Executive: Toh abhi woh problem aapka sort out ho gaya hai sir ya phir kuch aisa bacha hai jispe hum abhi help kar sakte hain?
Customer: Nahi abhi filhaal ke liye toh problem nahi hai accessibility hai woh kya hua tha pura logout ho gaya tha.
Executive: Haan haan woh main bata rahi thi na woh number change hone ke karan phir logout hua then shayad woh buyer profile pe aap login kar rahe the.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh things toh hamari discussion usi samay ho gayi thi koi issue nahi hai but next time agar aapko haan ji.
Customer: Bol rahe the jaise do major product hai na do major product hai aapka filter media sand aur filter media gravel.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Toh iska iska aisa bata sakte hain ki kitna hum log by leads purchase kiye the?
Executive: Ji ji bilkul ek minute.
Customer: Filter media sand aur filter media gravel ka.
Executive: Just a minute sir.

Executive: Filter media water filtration pebble ka puch rahe hain na aap sir?
Customer: Main category kaunsa hai aapka main main keyword kaunsa diya gaya hai?
Executive: Jo humne aapko provide kiya hua hai woh hai gravel water filtration pebble water filtration sand.
Customer: Achha filter media sand filter media gravel nahi hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Nahi maine suggest kiya tha last time aapke team mein kisi ko ki agar yeh jo aapke hero products mein aate hain toh is category pe bhi hum apna promotion karwa sakte hain but I guess abhi us pe mujhe koi woh nahi mila and hum aapka is pe competition bhi discuss kar rahe the last time.
Customer: Sand ka.
Executive: Sir sand ka bol rahe the keywords kuch bata dijiye pesticide sand bolke nahi aa raha hai toh.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi filter media sand aur filter media gravel se toh rehna hi chahiye tha keyword mein yeh kaise keyword mein nahi hai?
Customer: Haan yeh nahi the sir.
Executive: Aapka main jo aapne.
Customer: Wahi wahi aapka jo higher listing aap jis aapne keywords mein promotion karwa rahe hain basically sir woh hai aapka gravel water filtration sand water filtration pebble.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Filter media mein nahi hai koi matlab service chal rahi hai aapki higher listing nahi hai.
Customer: Water filtration sand aur water filtration pebbles ka aata hai water filtration sand ka utna nahi aata lekin pebbles ka aata hai jaise water filtration sand aur filter media sand hai toh ek hi cheez lekin.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Woh dekhna hoga ki aapka public ka search mein main search criteria kya hai maine jaise ki isme kis pe zyada hit hota hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Yeh water filtration sand and filter media dono ek hi cheez hai?
Customer: Haan ek hi cheez hai madam.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir toh main ispe thoda sa kaam kar leti hoon aur main aapko iska solution provide.
Customer: Abhi just check karke dekh sakte hain abhi just correct interrupt ho gaya actually aap check karke dekh sakte hain ki filter water filtration sand ya filter media sand dono mein kitna zyada matlab kaunsa zyada inquiries aata hai kis mein zyada inquiries aata hai check karke dekh sakte hain.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul just a minute.

Customer: Ek baar dekhiye please.

Customer: Sabse achha hai dono hi rehne de sakte hain kyunki pesticide sand bolke nahi aata hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi pesticide sand ka toh dena bhi nahi hai sir filter media mein zyada aa raha hai aapka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeh keywords zyada call sink bhi zyada flow hai inquiries bhi zyada hai lekin yeh aapka category jo hai woh promotion pe nahi hai aapka water filtration sand promotion pe hai but ho sakta hai jo aapke buyer ho ya buyer base jo hai unme filter media word zyada use hota hai toh woh zyada is cheez ko follow karte hain.
Customer: Filter media zyada hota hai actually kya hai na IndiaMART mein jis jaise pehle jo hum log ka tha jaise profile jaise profile hike kiye hain toh uske baad pehle se bhi matlab kharab ho gaya hai.
Executive: Kharab hua hai sir hum toh kaafi kaam kar rahe hain ispe bas.
Customer: Haan bas yeh yeh jo keywords ke chalte humko lagta hai ki gadbad hua hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapka promotion ab pehle se zyada ho raha hai aapki call response jo hai matlab call jo activity woh pehle se zyada ho rahi hai maybe inquiries.
Customer: Quality of leads nahi hai madam.
Executive: Sir quality of leads ab badhi hai ab aisa hota hai hamare paas jo quality aap jo aapko leads aa rahi hai usme koi bhi matlab aisa nahi hai ki less quantity ka matlab kisi ne dala na ho ya phir kisi ne proper requirement ka form na fill kiya ho ki usme koi cheez aisi hai jo reh rahi hai ya toh pura requirement usme likh ke aata hai ki yeh product hai itni quantity chahiye woh cheeze pehle aapko milti hoti multiple mil jaati thi par puri detail ke saath nahi milti thi ab kya aapko puri detail ke saath milti hai quantity kam hai lekin qualitative hai woh thoda sa lead jo hai aapka yeh benefit hua hai aapka lekin.
Customer: Jaise agar abhi change karte hain water filtration sand ko yeh filter media sand.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Achha aapko change karna hai isko?
Customer: Haan matlab jo jo zyada jis mein hit rehta hai usi ko matlab rakhna theek hai kyunki item dono ek hi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Toh bas public ka search language jo hai us pe rakhne se toh zyada achha rahega na madam.
Executive: Ji aap keh rahe ho sahi rahega.
Customer: Madam aap yeh dekh lijiye ki do keyword mein kaunsa kis ka inflow zyada hai traffic zyada hai uske hisab se woh keyword upload kar dijiye kyunki bahut baar main bhi dekha hoon water filtration sand mein construction sand ka bhi requirement aata hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Toh filter media agar likha rehta hai na toh actual inquiry hota hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Kyunki woh wohi use case ke liye lagta hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur waise hi matlab gravels mein jo hai filter media gravels kar dijiye kyunki gravels mein gravels rehna bhi rehne dete toh achha hoga gravels karke aata hai gravels pebbles only gravels only pebbles.
Customer: Only gravels pebbles mein aata hai.
Executive: Woh toh hai sir isse pehle toh aapne koi keyword change nahi karaya na?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Angit sir ek kaam karenge ek baar aap video meet pe aa sakte hain toh hum isko proper discussion kar le jaise ho sakta hai hum call pe hain kuch cheeze main aapko show karungi toh woh better tarike se ho payega.
Customer: Sure sir.
Executive: Haan aap mujhe aaj ek specific time bata dijiye jisse hum video meet kare aur usko proper tarike se ek baar discuss kar le ki kya better rahega.
Customer: Haan woh zyada achha rahega.
Executive: Theek.
Executive: Theek hai bata rahe the sir ko.
Executive: Aap matlab ek time bata denge sir jaise abhi meri discussion Manish sir se ho jaati thi lekin agar aap ek baar rahenge toh aur sahi rahega.
Customer: 12 abhi 12:00 baje sir.
Executive: Ji theek hai sir 12:00 baje kar lete hain video meet and discussion kar lete hain apart from it.
Customer: Haan Manoj sir.
Executive: Theek hai kar lijiye aap.
Executive: Theek hai toh aap rahenge kya?
Customer: Dekh lete hain reh jayenge.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: 12:00 baje.
Executive: Theek hai sir baki yeh jo aapka concern tha number change karne wala ab isme koi issue nahi hai na sir?
Customer: Nahi abhi toh filhaal koi issue nahi hai woh PNS calls mere number pe aana chahiye.
Executive: Haan haan woh toh chahiye usme koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Theek theek hai.
Executive: Toh yeh iske liye jo aapka concern open hua tha sir yeh concern main band kar deti hoon theek hai?
Executive: Number change karne ke liye theek hai aapke paas sir ek mail jayega mere liye ki maine aapko assist kaise kiya ya phir jaisa overall toh woh aapke paas mail jayega please mere liye usme feedback dijiyega.
Executive: And baki video meet ke liye hum connect karte hain sir 12:00 baje okay.
Customer: Theek okay.
Executive: Okay thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
Executive: Thank you. Thank you. Good afternoon.
summary:
Concerns:

- Login issue with Angit Sir's account.

- Wants to know the number of buyleads purchased.

- Wants to change keywords for better search results.

- PNS calls should come to the customer's number.



Resolution:

- Executive assisted with the login issue.

- Agreed to have a video meet to discuss keywords.

- Executive confirmed PNS calls will come to customer's number.

- Executive will close the concern regarding number change.



Next Steps: 

- Video meet at 12:00 PM to discuss keywords.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, keywords, buyleads, pns calls, video meet
